cmd.exe when it blows up (BUILD FAILED).  

When it blows up, a dialog appears with the following message" 
C:\WINDOWS\system32\ntvdm.exe
Error while setting up environment for the application. Choose 'Close' to 
terminate the application."

If I configure with command.com, then the build ends successfully.

This build has so far run successfully from a cmd.exe shortcut on a Windows 
2000 machine.
